creator: pier@betaversion.org

text: *** Bug 2092 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: pier@betaversion.org
harish@neosoftindia.com
text:
yes this is tomcat 3 related bug, but it also comes in Beta1 version of tomcat.
The Operating System is Windows 2000. Jdk version is 1.2.2.
There is no problem with Windows NT 4.0 SP6a . There was no errors. 
We have configured for windows 2000 server settings with IIS support also, 
but not working. Same way it abnormally shuts down.

 Is it the problem with our Win 2000 server or tomcat .

creator: nacho@apache.org
text:
Can you send more details about your config?

This is the last message in your logs?

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
Not enough informations, there are many people using tomcat on windows without
problems and from what you told us I can't guess what's wrong. Try on a
different machine, with a clean installation of JVM, try simple apps first. If
it fails only when you use your app, give us more info about it - is it a
servlet, is it happen all the time ? 

Sorry, I'll mark the bug as invalid - reopen it if you have more data.
